exceptions.summary: Thrown when the serializer builder is unable to build a delegate for the schema.
Thrown when the serializer builder is unable to build a delegate for the type.

memberSignatures.value: public Action<T,System.IO.Stream> BuildDelegate<T> (Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema schema, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<ValueTuple<Type,Chr.Avro.Abstract.Schema>,Delegate> cache = null);

parameters.name: schema
parameters.summary: The schema to map to the type.

parameters.name: cache
parameters.summary:
An optional delegate cache. The cache can be used to provide custom implementations for
            particular type-schema pairs, and it will also be populated as the delegate is built.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a delegate that writes a serialized object to a stream.

typeParameters.name: T
typeParameters.summary: The type of object to be serialized.
